snippet: Peconic Bay Winery has joined those vintners with satellite tasting rooms, and Roanoke Vineyards has plans for a second shop.
abstract: Howard Goldberg Long Island Vines column notes that Peconic Bay Winery in Cutchogue has opened second sales outlet, Empire State Cellars in Riverhead, and Roanoke Vineyards in Riverhead plans to open second shop in Mattituck (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: Peconic Bay Winery has joined those vintners with satellite tasting rooms, and Roanoke Vineyards has plans for a second shop.

headline.seo: Setting Up Tasting Rooms Far Away From Wineries
